Package cdx.opencdx.health.feign

Interface OpenCDXNpiRegistryClient

@FeignClient(name="npiRegistryClient") public interface OpenCDXNpiRegistryClient
Interface for the NPI Registry client.

  • Field Summary

    Field
    Description
    static final String
    NPI_VERSION
    The value of NPI_VERSION is "2.1"

      static final String NPI_VERSION

  • Method Details

    • getProviderInfo

      @Cacheable("npiProviderInfo") @GetMapping ResponseEntity<OpenCDXDtoNpiJsonResponse> getProviderInfo(@RequestParam("version") String version, @RequestParam("number") String providerNumber)
      Method to get provider info from NPI Registry
      Parameters:
      version - Version of the API, currently this should always be 2.1
      providerNumber - provider number to load info.
      Returns:
      OpenCDXDtoNpiJsonResponse DTO of the JSON response
